AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: MIMED Batch Add Visit Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: MIMED Batch Add Visit Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: UM Dev

SaveImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_UMHSBATCH_VISITS ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output ,@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@BATCHID uniqueidentifier ,@SEQUENCE int = NULL -- Batch fields ,@MRN nvarchar(50) = '' ,@PROVIDERDRNUMBER nvarchar(50) = '' ,@LASTPROCDATE datetime = null ,@VISITTYPE nvarchar(1) = 'O' ,@UMHSDATA_CSN bigint = 0 ,@UMHSDATA_PROV_ID bigint = 0 ,@VISITSTARTDATE datetime = null ,@VISITENDDATE datetime = null ,@PROVIDERROLE nvarchar(50) = '' ,@PATIENTHOSPITALROOM nvarchar(150) = '' ,@HOSPITALVISITDATE datetime = null ,@DEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@SUBDEPARTMENTID uniqueidentifier = null ,@CATEGORYMEMBERDESCRIPTION nvarchar(500) = '' ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
if @LASTPROCDATE is NULL set @LASTPROCDATE=@CURRENTDATE
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_UMHS_BATCH_VISITS (ID, BATCHID, SEQUENCE, DEPARTMENTID, SUBDEPARTMENTID, CATEGORYMEMBERDESCRIPTION, MRN, PROVIDERDRNUMBER, LASTPROCDATE, VISITTYPE, UMHSDATA_CSN, UMHSDATA_PROV_ID, VISITSTARTDATE, VISITENDDATE, PROVIDERROLE, PATIENTHOSPITALROOM, HOSPITALVISITDATE, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @BATCHID, @SEQUENCE, @DEPARTMENTID, @SUBDEPARTMENTID, @CATEGORYMEMBERDESCRIPTION, @MRN, @PROVIDERDRNUMBER, @LASTPROCDATE, @VISITTYPE, @UMHSDATA_CSN, @UMHSDATA_PROV_ID, @VISITSTARTDATE, @VISITENDDATE, @PROVIDERROLE, @PATIENTHOSPITALROOM, @HOSPITALVISITDATE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
